revision.comment: Forgot to add examples section and categories.
revision.text:
Double '''GetCameraHeight'''() Const
== Usage == Returns actors' the camera height.
=== Return value === Returns the camera height of the actor, if the actor has the default camera height of INT.MIN/-2147483648, then the function will return the actors' {{property|Height|height}} divided by 2, otherwise it will return the value of the {{property|CameraHeight}} property.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
